issue.title: [CF 1525] Fury Execute
issue.body:
Will only show the cooldown sometimes. Always reverts back to the old execute that has no cooldown. I am using the proper spell ID# 5308. I have to relog to get it to work properly, but that doesn't always work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Thanagos | Imported from CurseForge issue #1525 | Raw

comments.body:
Post the export string


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I have another group set to go off when I get a Sudden Death proc, which now that I think about it seems to have been the problem, but it's working fine now since the last update. I'll post again if the issue pops back up.

Edited Jul 21, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Thanagos

Can't see any issue with that icon. Are you sure it isn't just the cooldown resetting from Sudden Death?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Oh, it was.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
